title: April WIll Be HUGE For Crypto. From Today The Recovery Rally Has Begun!

it you're going to make sure that you're
on the weekly chart and then you're
going to go and click on the cog of this
indicator here and you're just going to
write 10 this is going to delay the
indicator by 10 weeks which is really
important why because the global M2
money supply which is the black line
runs 10 weeks in front of crypto it does
this because it takes about 10 weeks for
money to filter its way through real
estate through bonds and all the other
stuff out there in the global markets
before it reaches crypto which is at the
risk end of the risk curve okay yes I've
heard other people saying that there's a
more tight correlation between 105 days
and this chart but after back testing it
I think the most important thing for you
to pay attention to isn't really the
noise and stuff in between but more
importantly the bottoms where we see a

where we see a swing low okay so swing

see the tightest correlation on the
